snippet: Twenty peacekeepers detained Monday by rebels in South Sudan were released on Thursday, but 12 contractors were still being held.
abstract: South Sudan rebels release United Nations peacekeepers they had detained during theft of fuel from their barge; do not release 12 contractors who had also been detained.
lead_paragraph: Twenty peacekeepers detained Monday by rebels in South Sudan were released on Thursday, but 12 contractors were still being held.

headline.print_headline: Africa; South Sudan: Rebels Free Peacekeepers
